1.6.name: wordpress/discussit-moderator
1.6.description:
The DiscussIt plugin makes it easy to add DiscussIt comment moderation tools to your Wordpress blog.

The DiscussIt Live Moderator is a desktop client application that gives you the tools to moderate your comments in near real-time. There is also an IPhone version of the moderator on the Apple App Store, for moderating comments on the move.

An account must be created on http://www.discussit.com before DiscussIt tools will work using this plugin. Free accounts are available.
